resources.string: "'Timmy' the Tabby Identifying marks: heart shaped spot on her tail, one eye black spot, one eye white. Answers to her name. She needs medicine right away, family misses her. Last seen: Corner of Fifth st and Elm, Our City, State - Jan 12th 8:00 a.m. Contact (821) 555-1212 Email: TimmysFamily@gmail.com"
